ClobType.Name: DocLibTypes
ClobType.LoaderStatement: MERGE INTO doclibmgr.document_library_types t USING ( SELECT REPLACE(:name,'.xml') file_name FROM dual ) f ON (f.file_name = t.document_library_type) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET t.xml_data = :clob WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( id , document_library_type , xml_data , created_datetime ) VALUES ( doclibmgr.document_library_seq.NEXTVAL , f.file_name , :clob , SYSDATE )
